798310.name: Super Kids Racing Demo
798310.description:
Get Ready for Ultimate Kids Racing Adventure. This game will give you chance to make your kids happy with your happiness.

Features

-Suitable specially for kids and there families too.
-8 Racing Challenges with upto 100 laps in the game. (Upgrade to Unlock different Challenges. Free Version has 1 Challenge Unlocked).
-More then 100 cars available in the game. (Free Version has 2 cars unlocked).
-Various different environments like desert, snow, city,highway, etc.
-Both Kids and family will Enjoy this game.
-Fully tested on Windows.
-Ratings & Feedback Appreciated.
developers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
